SELECT SEQ_STUDY_GROUPS_ID.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO STUDY_GROUPS ( GROUP_ID, GROUP_NAME, CATEGORY, MAX_MEMBERS, STUDY_MODE, REGION, CONTACT, GROUP_INTRODUCTION, THUMBNAIL, GROUP_OWNER_ID, CREATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{groupId}, #{groupName}, #{category}, #{maxMembers}, #{studyMode}, #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact}, #{groupIntroduction}, #{thumbnail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupOwnerId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_ID, GROUP_NAME, CATEGORY, MAX_MEMBERS, STUDY_MODE, REGION, CONTACT, GROUP_INTRODUCTION, THUMBNAIL, GROUP_OWNER_ID, CREATED_AT, NULL as MEMBERSHIP_STATUS, NULL as NICKNAME FROM STUDY_GROUPS ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC

SELECT sg.GROUP_ID, sg.GROUP_NAME, sg.CATEGORY, sg.MAX_MEMBERS, sg.STUDY_MODE, sg.REGION, sg.CONTACT, sg.GROUP_INTRODUCTION, sg.THUMBNAIL, sg.GROUP_OWNER_ID, sg.CREATED_AT, sm.NICKNAME FROM STUDY_GROUPS sg LEFT JOIN STUDY_MEMBERSHIP sm ON sg.GROUP_OWNER_ID = sm.USER_ID AND sg.GROUP_ID = sm.GROUP_ID WHERE sg.GROUP_ID = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STUDY_MEMBERSHIP WHERE GROUP_ID = #{groupId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STUDY_GROUPS WHERE GROUP_NAME = #{groupName}

SELECT sg.GROUP_ID, sg.GROUP_NAME, sg.CATEGORY, sg.MAX_MEMBERS, sg.STUDY_MODE, sg.REGION, sg.CONTACT, sg.GROUP_INTRODUCTION, sg.THUMBNAIL, sg.GROUP_OWNER_ID, sg.CREATED_AT, sm.MEMBERSHIP_STATUS, sm.NICKNAME FROM STUDY_GROUPS sg INNER JOIN STUDY_MEMBERSHIP sm ON sg.GROUP_ID = sm.GROUP_ID WHERE sm.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY sg.CREATED_AT DESC

SELECT sg.GROUP_ID, sg.GROUP_NAME, sg.CATEGORY, sg.MAX_MEMBERS, sg.STUDY_MODE, sg.REGION, sg.CONTACT, sg.GROUP_INTRODUCTION, sg.THUMBNAIL, sg.GROUP_OWNER_ID, sg.CREATED_AT, sm.MEMBERSHIP_STATUS, sm.NICKNAME FROM STUDY_GROUPS sg INNER JOIN STUDY_MEMBERSHIP sm ON sg.GROUP_ID = sm.GROUP_ID WHERE sm.USER_ID = #{userId} AND sm.MEMBERSHIP_STATUS = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY sg.CREATED_AT DESC
